# Serial Killer Killing

As the Serial Killer, your job is to simply murder everyone to win.

  • Kill Cooldown
    • Set how long the Serial Killer needs to wait to Kill
  • Can Vent
    • ON: the Serial Killer has the ability to Vent
    • OFF: the Serial Killer cannot vent
  • Has Impostor Vision
    • ON: the Serial Killer has the same vision as an Impostor
    • OFF: the Serial Killer has default vision
  • Has Serial Killer Buddy
    • ON: the Serial Killer gets a teammate on their team
      • Chance to Spawn
        • Set the chance that the Serial Killer will have to get a teammate
    • OFF: the Serial Killer will be alone
  • Reflect harmful interactions
    • ON: the Serial Killer will be impacted by any harmful interactions
    • OFF: the Serial Killer will be immune to any harmful interactions

From: Town of Salem 1 & Coding: Loonie Toonsopen in new window
